buildDefaultSeaColor

getColor

public void getColor(double u,
                     double v,
                     RGBAColor value)
Description copied from interface: Texture
Calculates the color for co-ordinates u,v and puts the result in the RGBAColor value object passed in.

Parameters:
u - U component used to generate the texture
v - V Component used to generate the texture
value - RGBAColor object used to receive the result
